People think AI know-how costs $1,000s. It doesn't.

So I made a list of the 9 best free AI guides:

1. ChatGPT fundamentals.

Learn the (very) basics of ChatGPT in 3 minutes.

Link: https://lnkd.in/dA7kiYaA.

2. OpenAI Academy — academy.openai.com.

The official academy of ChatGPT & OpenAI.

3. ChatGPT for any role.

Quick prompts from the OpenAI Academy.

Link: https://lnkd.in/dedMMx6M.

4. Set up your ChatGPT.

No one taught you how to (properly) set up ChatGPT.

Link: https://lnkd.in/dA3FGZjc.

5. Be rude to ChatGPT.

The do’s and don’ts of deep prompt engineering.

Link: ruben.substack.com/p/sorry.

6. How to go from 0 to 10,000 followers.

How to get your first 10,000 followers on Linkedin. Using AI.

Link: https://lnkd.in/dP_6piGk.

7. Claude prompting, advanced techniques.

Only for people comfortable with prompt engineering.

Link: https://lnkd.in/d2MUdFZD.

8. Gemini prompting guide

The best prompt guide, straight from Google.

Link: https://lnkd.in/dqc3AK6n.

9. Prompting 101 by Anthropic.

An entire course on how to prompt Claude.

Link: https://lnkd.in/dNyFUTyg.
